title: Manoharam Pearl Drop Jhumkas - A Fusion of Tradition and Elegance
materials: adorned with Pink Tourmaline gemstones (గులాబీ రంగు రత్నాలు)
and lustrous South Sea Pearls (ముత్యాలు). Features a radiant Hyderabadi Polish for an unparalleled shine.
features: These exquisite jhumkas boast a unique floral design with a contemporary touch. The floral arrangement is meticulously set with pink tourmalines and shimmering cubic zirconia, creating a stunning visual effect. The delicate South Sea pearls dangle gracefully, adding a touch of classic charm. The intricate detailing showcases the skilled craftsmanship synonymous with Hyderabad's jewelry heritage.
colors: and Creamy White Pearls create a harmonious and sophisticated color palette.
occasions: and special occasions. These jhumkas will also add a touch of glamour to any modern evening attire.
description: These Jhumkas represent a perfect blend of South Indian tradition and contemporary design. The high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and durability. The unique floral design and exquisite color combination make this piece a true statement of style. The lustrous Hyderabadi Polish ensures a dazzling shine that captures attention.
